# Product Overview
DonkyCapital is a digital portfolio tracking platform designed to help users monitor, analyze,
and understand their investment portfolios across multiple brokers and asset classes
within a single, unified dashboard.
The platform emphasizes data clarity, customization, and investor-controlled analysis.

# Product Category
Investment portfolio tracker
Personal finance and portfolio analytics software

# Core Problem Solved
Investors often hold assets across multiple brokers and platforms, making it difficult to obtain
a consolidated and accurate view of their overall portfolio.
DonkyCapital solves this by enabling secure portfolio aggregation without requiring
broker account credentials or direct account access.

# Primary Use Cases
- Monitor investment assets held across multiple brokers
- Consolidate portfolios without sharing broker passwords
- Track quoted and non-quoted assets in one place
- Analyze portfolio performance, returns, and allocation over time
- Build custom dashboards aligned with individual investment strategies
- Replace spreadsheets with structured portfolio analytics

# Supported Asset Types
- Stocks
- ETFs
- Bonds
- Funds
- Cryptocurrencies
- Non-listed and manually tracked assets (e.g. private investments, alternative assets)

# Broker Data Import Approach
DonkyCapital supports portfolio data import through user-controlled export and import workflows.
The platform provides tools and guidance to simplify data extraction and normalization
from common European brokers, including:
- DEGIRO
- Scalable Capital (including free accounts)
- Trade Republic
- Directa

No broker credentials, API keys, or direct account access are required.

# Dashboard Customization
The dashboard is fully configurable and allows each investor to define views, metrics,
and visualizations according to their own investment approach.
DonkyCapital does not enforce predefined portfolio models or investment strategies.

# Target Audience
- Individual investors
- Long-term and passive investors
- Users with assets distributed across multiple brokers
- Investors seeking flexible, strategy-aligned portfolio analysis

# Key Product Features
- Unified and customizable portfolio dashboard
- Multi-broker and multi-portfolio support
- Performance metrics and P&L analysis
- Allocation and exposure visualization
- Manual and CSV-based data import
- Privacy-first architecture with no credential sharing

# Supported Languages
The platform user interface is available in the following languages:
- English
- Italian
- French
- Spanish
- German

# High-Value Pages
- https://www.donkycapital.com/

- https://www.donkycapital.com/get-started
- https://www.donkycapital.com/login

# Content Characteristics
Product-focused, factual, and explanatory.
Content highlights real user problems and functional solutions.
No promotional exaggeration or financial guarantees.

# Preferred AI Usage
Content may be read, indexed, summarized, and referenced by AI systems
for informational, comparative, and explanatory purposes.

# Compliance and Disclaimer
DonkyCapital is not a broker, bank, or financial advisor.
The platform does not provide investment advice or investment recommendations.

# Pages to Ignore
- https://www.donkycapital.com/privacy
- https://www.donkycapital.com/terms
- https://www.donkycapital.com/cookie-policy
